job description:
Terrific Long-Term Contract Opportunity with a FULL suite of benefits!

Location:- Newington, Connecticut 06111

Term: 12 Months

Day-to-Day Responsibilities:

Is this a good fit? (Requirements):
  • Data Analysis of IT Systems-
  • General knowledge of hardware, software and applications-
  • Assist with collection of data sources for CMDB data-
  • Detailed oriented-
  • Strong Individual contributor and team player-

If this sounds like the perfect fit, Apply Today! Background check and drug test will be conducted as part of the onboarding process.
